message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

Hi Bob, I understand you're interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. However, I was really hoping to get closer to my initial offer. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $8800. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $8200 is a fair price. I'm hoping we can work out a deal.

Hi Bob, I understand you're still interested in the product, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my initial offer and your latest one. I'm willing to sell it to you for $8600. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really love the product!
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $7800 is a more reasonable price. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
